remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 、 和 的基类。 is the base class for , , and . 在新的 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用及其相关的类来创建可以具有 WINDOWS XP、Office、Internet Explorer 或自定义外观和行为的工具栏，所有这些都可以使用或不使用主题，并支持溢出和运行时项重新排序。Use and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering. 控件还提供丰富的设计时体验，其中包括就地激活和编辑、自定义布局以及在指定的中共享水平或垂直空间 。 controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified . 类提供许多成员，用于管理绘制、鼠标和键盘输入以及拖放功能。The class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality. 将 类与类结合使用， 以获取对 Windows 窗体上所有控件的绘制样式和布局样式更进一步的控制和可定制性。Use the class with the class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all controls on a Windows Form. 以下各项专用于 在所有方向上无缝使用和 。The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both and in all orientations. 默认情况下，它们在设计时可用于 控件：They are available by default at design time for the control: - - - - - - - 你可以 在指定的 和合并控件中相互联接控件 。You can join controls within a specified and merge controls with each other. 使用 而不是 多个文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序。Use rather than for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications. 通常， 除非绝对定位，而不是停靠或在中，否则不会参与 tab 键顺序 。Typically, a does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a . 使用 类可承载中的任何其他 Windows 窗体控件 。Use the class to host any other Windows Forms control in a . 默认情况下，使用 设置进行双缓冲。 By default, the is double buffered, taking advantage of the setting. 替换并扩展 控件。 replaces and extends the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 和添加 到 Windows 窗体，将项添加到 中，并将添加 到的 。The following code example demonstrates adding a and a to a Windows Forms, adding items to the , and adding the to the of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可定义 自动调整的大小，因为其父控件调整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 将控件锚定到其父控件可确保在调整父控件的大小时，定位边缘与父控件边缘的相对位置保持不变。Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized. > [!NOTE] > 和 属性互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 一次只能设置一个，而最后一个集则优先。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置公共属性的语法 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

value.span: 如果控件调整宽度以完整显示内容，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将设置 为 `false` ，并且 嵌入到面板中 ，则在 将移到的其他面板时，不会转换的边界 。If you set to `false` and the is embedded in a panel, the bounds of the are not translated when you move the to a different panel of the . 若要正确地转换边界，请同步 事件，检查属性的值 ，然后重设大小 。To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the event, check the value of the property, and resize the . 、、 、 和 属性与图像处理的各个方面相关。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 通过直接设置这些属性或通过设置运行时属性来使用控件中的图像 。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time-only property. 图像缩放是通过和中的属性交互确定的 ，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 最终映像的小数位数，由图像 设置和容器设置的组合确定 。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果 `true` (默认) 并且 为，则 不会发生图像缩放，并且 大小是最大项的大小，或者是指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果 为 `false` 且 为 ，则不 会发生图像和缩放。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置公共属性的语法 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可定义 自动调整的大小，因为其父控件调整大小。Use the property to define how a is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，将设置 为 会导致将 自身与父控件的左边缘对齐，并在父控件调整大小时进行重设大小。For example, setting to causes the to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控件按其 z 顺序停靠，即窗体上的控件沿窗体 z 轴的可视化分层 (深度) 。Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth). 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边缘，也可以停靠到所有边缘并填充父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. 如果 控件在中 ，则可以在 内和之间重定位 。If the control is in a , the can be repositioned within the and across s. 忽略属性，如果 属性为 `false` ，则在将 项添加到 中时，的大小将增长。The property is ignored, and if the property is `false`, the size of the grows as items are added to the . 通常，不 参与 tab 键顺序。Typically, the does not participate in the tab order. > [!NOTE] > 和 属性互相排斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 一次只能设置一个，而最后一个集则优先。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置公共属性的语法 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 、、 、 和 属性与图像处理的各个方面相关。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 通过直接设置这些属性或通过设置运行时属性来使用控件中的图像 。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time-only property. 图像缩放是通过和中的属性交互确定的 ，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 最终映像的小数位数，由图像 设置和容器设置的组合确定 。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果 `true` (默认) 并且 为，则 不会发生图像缩放，并且 大小是最大项的大小，或者是指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果 为 `false` 且 为 ，则不 会发生图像和缩放。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性控制图像的默认大小。Use the property to control the default size of an image. 用于 使上图像的大小 自动调整以适应， 同时保留原始图像的比例。Use to make the size of the image on a to automatically adjust to fit on a while retaining the original image proportions. 、、 、 和 属性与图像处理的各个方面相关。The , , , , and properties pertain to various aspects of image handling. 通过直接设置这些属性或通过设置运行时属性来使用控件中的图像 。Use images in controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time-only property. 图像缩放是通过和中的属性交互确定的 ，如下所示：Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both and , as follows: - 最终映像的小数位数，由图像 设置和容器设置的组合确定 。 is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's setting and the container's setting. - 如果 `true` (默认) 并且 为，则 不会发生图像缩放，并且 大小是最大项的大小，或者是指定的最小大小。If is `true` (the default) and is , no image scaling occurs, and the size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size. - 如果 为 `false` 且 为 ，则不 会发生图像和缩放。If is `false` and is , neither image nor scaling occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置公共属性的语法 ，包括 属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting common properties, including the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 窗口消息预处理过程中调用方法，以确定给定输入字符是否应经过预处理或直接发送到 。The method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the . 如果该 方法返回 `true` ，则将指定的字符直接发送到 。If the method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the . 但是，如果该方法返回 `false` ，则该字符将经过预处理并仅在 预处理阶段不使用它时发送到。However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 字符的预处理包括检查字符是否为另一个控件的助记键。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 消息预处理过程中调用方法来处理对话框字符，如选项卡、返回、转义和箭头键。The method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys. 仅当 方法指示控件未处理该键时，才调用此方法。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只是将字符发送到父控件的 方法， `false` 如果该控件没有父级，则返回。The simply sends the character to the parent control's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类将重写此方法以执行对话框键的实际处理。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 仅当控件承载于 Windows 窗体应用程序或 ActiveX 控件中时，才会调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or an ActiveX control.

para.span: 当在 派生类中重写方法时，控件应返回 以指示它已处理该键。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, a control should return to indicate that it has processed the key.

para.span: 对于不是由控件处理的键，应返回调用基类的方法的结果 。

span.span: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's method should be returned.

para.span: 控件很少需要重写此方法（如果需要）。

span.span: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.

Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 处理助记键字符。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法以使控件有机会处理助记键字符。The method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 此方法应确定控件是否处于用于处理助记键的状态，以及给定字符是否表示助记键。This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果是这样，则该方法应执行与助记键关联的操作，并返回 `true` 。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，则该方法应返回 `false` 。If not, the method should return `false`. 此方法的实现通常使用 方法来确定给定字符是否与控件文本中的助记键匹配。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 此方法的默认实现 只返回 `false` ，以指示该控件没有助记键。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `directed` `forward` 容器样式的控件使用和参数。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 当 `directed` 参数设置为时，将对 `true` 参数进行 `forward` 计算，以确定要选择哪个控件。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 当 `forward` 设置为时 `true` ，将选择 tab 键顺序中的下一个控件; 如果为 `false` ，则选择 tab 键顺序中的上一个控件。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected. 如果控件的 样式位设置为，则该方法会激活控件， `true` 它包含在另一个控件中，并且其所有父控件都可见并处于启用状态。The method activates the control if the control's style bit is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过方法进行筛选后，所有消息都将发送到 方法 。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法与 Windows `WindowProc` 函数完全对应。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅 [WindowProc 函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/legacy/ms633573(v=vs.85))。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/legacy/ms633573(v=vs.85)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以处理结构中标识的操作系统消息 。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. 在此示例中处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息，以了解其他应用程序何时变为活动状态。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 有关可用的 、 和值的信息 ，请参阅位于的平台 SDK 文档参考 。For information about the available , , and values, see the Platform SDK documentation reference located at . 可以在 "平台 SDK (Core SDK" 部分中包含的 windows .h 标头文件中找到实际常数值，) 下载，也可以在文档中找到该文件。Actual constant values can be found in the windows.h header file included in the Platform SDK (Core SDK section) download, which is also available on Docs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承控件应调用基类的 方法来处理其不处理的所有消息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
